document_data.name: Black Frog
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Frog''' was a tavern of some repute in the city of [[Athkatla]] in [[Amn]].
document_data.History: The Black Frog was a favorite local establishment in the city's [[Athkatla/Trades District|Trades District]] as of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. However, the Frog was not distinct enough for the famous writer [[Volothamp Geddarm]] to talk about it in any detail in his book â€“ ''Volo's Guide to Baldur's Gate'', published at some point in the late 14{{th}} century DR.
